channel.title: Elluzion V2 [RuneSource]
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://img130.imageshack.us/img130/7411/elluszion1.png[/img] [B]Information[/B] I know your thinking, What didn't you just make a project thread? Yes i did But the moment i found out that it was going to fail i decided That i was going to start From a Blank Base, The Base is Called "[b]Rune-Source[/b]" Made by my Friend Blakeman8192, It is one of The most Stable Base's Out At the Moment. As we Speak i am Programming content For the Blank base.
[B]Feature's[/B]
[ul][*]Item Prices,Bonuses [*]Wear item [*]Ground item's [*]Banking Support [*]Command's [*]Prayer[/ul]
[B]Team[/B] Project Starter: Ryan Project Co-Starter: None Server-Sided Programmer's [1/3] Client-Sided Programmer [0/1] Beta-Tester's [0/20] Gfx Artist's [0/2] [B] Application[/B]
[CODE]Name:
Contact info:
Age:
Hours of day your available:
Location:
Previous work:
Where can i find your previous Work:
Any other Information:[/CODE]
NOTE: If You Flame this thread You will be reported and if you have nothing nice to post dont Post at all [/CENTER]

There not going to be doing all the work, Ive just been Studying the source basically so far.
